data.title: A must when I come home
data.text: I live in North Dallas now but always come to Moonie's when I'm back home.  Burgers are thick and cooked perfectly and the buns are homemade and sweet.  Fries and beer too.  Can't be beat.

data.title: Moonie's burgers.....sweet buns!
data.text: I love Moonie's!  I usually get the Chili Cheese, but you have to tell them no Lettuce on it if you want it Texas-Style.  The Fritos on top are a great crunch factor.  It's a big and filling burger that I usually get a la carte because I never finish the fries.  If going with 2 people, get 1 order of fries to share.  The Western is really good too.....The Onion Ring is crispy and BIG....yummy! I've also had the Munay Thai and Hawaiian, but as a Chicken Sandwich.  I highly recommend this place!!

data.title: Who does that?!
data.text: This is an unpretentious burger joint that doesn't pretend to be anything more than what it is - DELICIOUS.  You won't find a $15 burger that's chasing after the latest hipster fad.  But, that doesn't mean they shouldn't be starting trends!  Tip: Be a little adventurous and try the special.  I got a thai burger that was just a little bit spicy (curry?) with pineapple and...peanut butter.  Who does that?!  I was skeptical, but it was incredible.  I actually went back the next week for it.  They have a good selection of craft beers too.

data.title: good local burger joint
data.text: large selection of generously sized burgers.  Had a nice chocolate shake & fries with it.  Very much a local place - nothing " chain"about it.  We left satisfied.  The buns are Hawaiian sweet bread, which some might not care for.  I liked it.

data.title: Best burgers ever
data.text:
Went here for lunch because supposedly, for the last six years, they've been voted best burgers in the Cedar Park. They're burgers are DELICIOUS. They have a really tasty bun that fits perfectly with the burger. Every burger can be substituted for a veggie patty, which is great for all the vegetarians.

If you want a tasty burger and great service, this is the place to go. They definitely have the best burgers in the greater Austin area.

data.title: Awesome place!
data.text: Have loved this place since they opened and been going for years. Wonderful burgers with a veggie burger alternate and sweet potato fries ! Yum!!

data.title: Great Burger
data.text: Awesome burger one of the best I've had.  The western is my favorite and the staff is very attentive.

data.title: Excellent burgers
data.text: We were nicely surprised at the quality, variety and preparation of the burgers and sides served at this neighborhood restaurant. We were served two of the best hamburgers we have had in Austin. Highly recommended.

data.title: Good place to take the family
data.text: The burgers and beer are very delicious. The kids menu is reasonably priced and offers a nice variety. Our grandkids (ages 5, 7, and 8) "love" the made to order snow cones that come with their meal.

data.title: Best Burgers in Town
data.text: This place gets the bun and the meat right. There are plenty of selections on the menu for a variety of burger tastes. The family loves going here!

data.title: Nice place! Perfect for kids.
data.text: This is your neighborhood burger joint. Perfect for families. You order & pay at the counter and then sit yourself. It wasn't crowded when we went so we could easily find a booth. The burgers are served on Hawaiian style bun, which makes it on the sweet side. But you can substitute the Hawaiian bun with Texas toast, wheat bun or even gluten free option. I tried the chicken burger with mushrooms & Swiss cheese. My hubby tried their veggie patty. The kiddo had chicken fingers with fries. All the food was great. The kid meal comes with free shaved ice. And yes, they have tiger's blood. All in all a good solid neighborhood favorite!

data.title: Cedar Park's #1 burger 3 years in a row
data.text: Nice hamburgers on Hawaiian style buns, a little sweet.  Everything tastes fine, cooked how you want it, and a very nice atmosphere.

data.title: Great Burgers
data.text: The Chili Cheese Burger was excellent. The meat was juicy with delicious burger bun! The atmosphere was causal with friendly staff.

data.title: Delicious burgers!
data.text: I love their burgers.  We always crave Moonie's on Monday's when they are closed.  They need to update their decor and kid area but the food is awesome.

data.title: Nice atmosphere, great burgers.
data.text:
Our whole family met for a family dinner and grabbed a large table in the back.  The selection of burgers is terrific and everything we ate was absolutely delicious!  

The staff was friendly, the service was fast, and we'll definitely be coming back again to try more of their yummy creations.

data.title: Hawaiian burger was superb!
data.text: Ate here solo after a day at the mall. I ordered a Hawaiian burger- beef with grilled pineapple and teriyaki  sauce, plus a side of regular French fries. Delicious! This is a really good burger on a sweet tasting bun. The fries were hot! I love it when I get fresh FF and they are hot.  Service was good, food was good- I'll be back. There menu has various burgers and some salads too. Family friendly with a small s place won't disappoint.

data.title: Best burgers and lots of other stuff too!
data.text: I like the plain jane with american cheese. Portions are large enough to share, or if you're alone, a kids meal will work.

data.title: Must try!  Best burgers in Cedar Park!
data.text: This place is delicious!  We eat there at least once a week. Lots of choices, everything I have had has been excellent.  The service is outstanding.  You can't go wrong eating at Moonie's.

owner_response.author: Stuart W, Owner at Moonie's Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to review Moonie's! I'm happy you're working your way down the menu. There are plenty of great options to choose from - make sure you try the "Munay Thai" - it's my personal favorite! Regards, Stuart
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Burgers
data.text: This is a great place to get a good burger. Their buns are fantastic. You should try chili nachos.  My family loves meeting at Moonies often.

owner_response.author: Stuart W, Owner at Moonie's Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for making Moonie's your go-to burger stop!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The secret is in their sweet buns...
data.text: Seriously.  Best burger buns evah.  They have a "thai" burger (the "MUNAY THAI", with teriyaki-glazed pineapple, jalapeno, peanut sauce, sriracha, and fresh cilantro) on the menu, and that's the only thing I order now, it is AMAZING.  Staff is friendly.  Bottled beer selection is decent and priced reasonably.
